He wrote: "The row has led to two rival factions among the staff at No 10- the` pro-Andy Coulson faction', made up mainly of Mr Andy Coulson 's loyal press office team, and the` anti-Andy Coulson faction' led by Mr Hilton and his aides. Insiders report fierce clashes between the two over policy... Google on Monday reiterated that it was co-operating with the regulator. There's always going to be room for improvement, so we'll be working with the Commission to address any concerns, spokesman Al Verney said.
